title: Getting 9.5 cgpa
content:
Im joining as a fresher in PES RR CSE. I'd like to ask seniors what exactly you did to get 9.5 cgpa while balancing other projects, hackathons,developing skills, events in college, etcetc. can pessat students be better than cet ppl by putting in extra effort? 

another doubt is my main aim is MS abroad. So  should i sit for placement and then reject the package i am offered.

comments.body:
Regarding your second doubt.. you‚Äôre still joining PES
You shouldn‚Äôt worry about placements from today itself
Worry about it after 5th sem starts
You are junior .you are not qualified to speak about it . Let a senior talk about the second part¬†
Bro you go spam every 2 weeks on this Reddit regarding when will college reopen like you‚Äôve been doing
Not relevant¬†

Neither are your posts relevant

Literally every 2 weeks you ask a question whxib nobody has an answer to

Before pointing at others, see what you‚Äôre doing first

At least I‚Äôm helping someone unlike you
Grow up

I said not relevant to what i am saying . I post when is college reopening because many people are bored and waiting for college to start. To get mental peace . You are trying to help . But when you don't know or are not qualified to talk about the second part of the topic let a senior talk
Not really. It has a tag called ask a senior¬†

If OP wants to hear my opinion, he shall. It was a doubt asked by him and not by you. If you asked the doubt and if I had responded, you could‚Äôve told me that I don‚Äôt have experience as I am a fresher
You‚Äôre not even the one who asked the question at the first place.


Again maybe you‚Äôre finding it too hard to understand .
It‚Äôs an open platform and anybody can reply
The post literally has ask a senior .better to not talk rather than spread misinformation¬†

The flair is so that Seniors can easily access it. 
It doesn‚Äôt prevent anybody except seniors to respond

Well, it‚Äôs has a tag regarding seniors right. Why have you responded in this seniors post

Let a senior tell what I‚Äôve told is misinformation, then I‚Äôll delete my replies

Anyway, how will a person keep on spamming same question over and over again, a question which doesn‚Äôt even have an answer to, understand what is correct information and what‚Äôs not
Because a junior like you was spreading misinformation¬†

Ok boss

You‚Äôre so talented enough and smart enough that you being a fresher yourself are able to correct others

I admire your talent

I‚Äôm not responding further to useless discussions

I responded to help OP
Unlike you who‚Äôs putting up an unless argument 

And for gods sake.. stop spamming about when will college start. 

‚úåÔ∏è

So that they can stay updated on the latest dates and speculations . So that any sudden changes do not come and so that they have mental peace . People are really bored staying in home .and i am not the only one asking this question all the time . Check discord forums also. This question is very common¬†
Kay. Will not spam .live in peace¬†

Just because all are doing wrong, doesn‚Äôt give you any rights to do the same mistake

Also.. for knowing when college shall start, there is an official pes website and they‚Äôll update it. PES won‚Äôt give out a circular and tell college is starting tomorrow and all must attend. So there won‚Äôt be so called ‚Äúsudden changes‚Äù
And better to not help rather than spread my misinformation¬†

Man

Hats off to what your brain perceived as misinformation
 
I can‚Äôt win an argument with you

I give up

I didn't know when college will start asking is wrong . Yes ik pes has offical website but kea and other factors also influence nah .you can't just sit and think college will start one day .as many people are fed up of holidays and just want college to start. Ik it's annoying to post the same thing in subreddit but it's literally what anyone can do
Well,even a high school passed out guy who scrolled this/any btech related sub would tell the same.I'd advice you to do that too, it will help genuinely help u

You yourself are accepting that it‚Äôs annoying for posting the same  thing over and over again

Yet you‚Äôre supporting yourself that what you‚Äôre doing is right

 ü´°
Nice . It is hard to win an argument against a smart person . It is impossible to win an argument against a stupid person like me huh . This vibes i am getting lol
It is fun to do chutiyappa in reddit lol

Thanks man
I hope that maintenance guy does maintenance to himself üòÇ

‚úåÔ∏è
Go do your  useless shit in other servers. This server is for helping people. Not for your ‚Äúchutiyappa ‚Äú

Did you go through this subreddit before posting the question? No offence,   
but what do you mean by "reject the package I am offered?" I dont think you understand how placements work

You yourself said that this is open reddit and anyone can post. lol what a hypocrite.gets angry when someone corrects them due to massive ego and when i said that it is fun to do chutiyappa i meant with you bcoz you can't accept a single thing properly due to debate brain and big ego.arguing witha person like you is literally doing chutiyappa only
He did not support you . He said that people like you can speak that much only and he said that yes you can do both also or something¬†

Anyway,  i can‚Äôt be jobless and keep arguing with a INSANE guy like you. 

Let‚Äôs end it here for the decorum of this server

Peace out

Look at what the other fourth year senior is saying .what you are saying everyone knows.everyone knows placement is in fourth year but do you know what the fourth year senior is saying? No social stfu and mind your business¬†

I'm not a 9.5 cgpa person but this what I have learnt.
‚Ä¢ Try revising concepts done daily.
‚Ä¢ Do not leave stuff for last minute.
‚Ä¢ Listen to classes(try ur best at least)
‚Ä¢ Youtube lectures are your savior(good for revision as well as first time)
‚Ä¢ Making notes helps, especially from 2nd year. Those notes will be important from placement poverty as well
‚Ä¢ Textbook questions? ( I never did them but I've been told it helps )
‚Ä¢ Participate in hackathons and events. ( Experience sake)

Projects and certifications 
‚Ä¢ Full stack projects are prefer
‚Ä¢ Keep Github and LinkedIn updated 
‚Ä¢ Certifications are a bit important. Try doing one or two( Full stack and whichever stream u r interested in)

Placements
‚Ä¢ start coding from now or 2nd year pakka. Doesn't have to be strict everyday but weekly? (Regret not doing this)
‚Ä¢ Projects, work experience are imp ig
‚Ä¢ increase coding yearly. U learn more concepts in 2nd year. By the time placements come around it's much easier for u to think about the logic behind solving.

That's about it. I hope this helps a bit. I've told all the things i was told to do but didn't follow and now regret it GREATLY.
Learn from your mistakesüò≠
Bro where were u these days in this sub? such a good input!
To be honest I only know people who are exceptionally good at coding and all but doesn‚Äôt have a gpa above 9, and people who have 9+ gpa are just some avg and slightly above avg
Which YouTube lectures are you referring to? Thank you for this

Sounds like wanna be "SIGMA"ü§£

Like some random company will plead with him to come join us XD
Bro thinks companies will come to him üòÇüòÇ
ThanksüòÇ

‚Ä¢ Gate smashers (This saved me last minute but do it prior xD)
‚Ä¢ Apna College
‚Ä¢ PESU AV summary(if it is good)
‚Ä¢ etc

Just search the topic on youtube u have many available. Some have playlists too. 

Try finding a channel whose explanations make sense to you. (Gate smashers for me) 

If I remember more channels I'll let you guys know.

Enjoy studying ig? üòÇ
Proper placements start around end of 6th sem.
thanks mate this is a great advice. rn which what r u abt?
Anytime! I didn't quite understand the second part tho?
Haha thank you for this! but what is AV summary?

Basically u have access to PESU ka official sight where you get your lectures, question banks, etc. AV summary is just one of the faculty or TAs teaching that lecture. 

Downside, some of the videos are live classes so end up being 1 hour long.
I see thanks for explaining

hey bro or u/rowlet-owl , many people are telling that rr aiml is now exactly same as ecity cs course wise..... forget about masters but for placements the recruiters won't sit and see ur courses right, they will see the degree and it will have aiml. so wont they recruite u moree for ml jobs like data analyst? ik the placements havent started but this is what I think.

I actually dk cuz aiml started in the batch after mine. Some companies do come for specific ml related so that may give a little edge. You still need to be well versed with ur course syllabus cuz most of it they might ask in placements. 
Also degree they'll see only after u graduate during job changes, rn courses matter more. Your knowledge about those courses matters most.

So in my opinion not much difference?
I actually love studying esp math n phy (integration)
Nvm I'll figure out
